newsitem.title: FRANCE: Pau Jan-Nov air freight and mail traffic declines.
newsitem.headline: Pau Jan-Nov air freight and mail traffic declines.

text.p: Air freight handled at Pau-Pyrenees airport totalled 1,096 tonnes in the first eleven months of 1996, down 0.2 percent on the same period in 1995, airport authority figures showed.
Air France Europe generates the major part of cargo traffic handled at Pau Airport while other airline operators include fellow French carriers, Air Littoral and Regional Airlines.
Jan-Nov postal traffic handled at Pau Airport declined by 11.1 percent on 1995 levels to 1,074 tonnes.
French airline, L'Aeropostale, carries overnight mail to and from Pau on a regular basis, using 4.5 tonne-capacity Fokker 27 aircraft.
